amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 118-142 to amend Section 904 to prohibit federal funds from being used to establish a position within the Department of Defense for anything similar to Chief Diversity Officers or Senior Advisors for Diversity and Inclusion.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits federal funds from being used to establish a position within the Department of Defense for anything similar to Chief Diversity Officers or Senior Advisors for Diversity and Inclusion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 212 (Roll no. 308).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Roy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 212 (Roll no. 308).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
